title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Everyone: "boy i sure do wish Rito would give us urf!"

RITO: "You heard it, they want the Poro King"
Yeap, this about sums it up...

You know I don't mind ascencion, hexakill or poroking that much. They're kinda fun though URF(true URF) is better. The issue is nexus siege because I've never met anyone who liked this gamemode. It's unbalanced, it's rage inducing, it's kinda cramped and static.

Riot please, nobody likes nexus siege. Just stop you can't make us like nexus siege, give up and just bring us URF.
**3** WEEKS OF LEGEND OF THE PORO KING? ARE U SERIOUS???
For Snowdown
3 weeks -_- the whole point of a "rotating" queue is to rotate the god damn game modes.
yeah, but this is the time of year that even if RGQ didn't exist we would get 3 weeks of Poro King anyways (cause NA winter)

Bring URF to the holiday season !!!!
or can we have a poll to determine the percentage of time a game mode should be   played? {{item:3633}}
EXACTLY! DO URF
As I thought why don't they do Urf hexakill or any other kind of combining like hexakill poroking. It would be awesome to bring the 2 most popular gamemodes together. I would be an amazing

Honest to god why is this game mode put on so much. Christmas ended in december, put on something fun i.e. NOT ascension or its variations, not nexus siege and its variations, and not more aram variations - WE HAVE ARAM
1. rito if u want to ask for our feedback and listen plz we like poro king but not for three weeks that's just too much. one for all or urf is better rito come on man
3 weeks of poro king for the snow day event. You got it guys we get 3 weeks of ultra rapid fire on the first of April...Rito give me a reason why we won't and I will laugh
Why is everyone complaining about 3 weeks of Poro King? It is for the snow day event .

because we never got urf for 3 weeks on the event, instead we got draven day and poro king then urf for only 3 days compared to now which every gm has 4 days. Poro king = 12 days, Urf = 3 days??? I see no reason to complain
yea i agree
So we get nexus siege then THREE weeks of poro king. Riot sure does know which game modes we hate the most. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
WHY IS THERE 3 WHOLE WEEKS OF PORO? WHY NOT JUST REPLACE IT WITH ONE FOR ALL?
Makes me wonder if they even care that the same god damn Gamemode is on for 3 god damn weeks....
do we still keep a record of what rotation is on for the weekends ??
Get into the Christmas cheer guys!
